Entry.JapaneseText: スージーんとこで、ごちそう食いたかったなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I really wanted to eat that dinner at Susie's place...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺がいたばかりに……すまなかったな。
Entry.EnglishText: It's all because I was there... My apologies.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、あんたは悪くないだろ？ 悪いのはあのスカラベってオヤジさ！
Entry.EnglishText: No, it wasn't your fault now, was it? That Scarabe guy was in the wrong!

Entry.JapaneseText: もともとガジュマに対する差別は 強かったというが……
Entry.EnglishText: She said that he's always held a strong prejudice against Gajuma, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>思念<White>の影響でますます ひどくなっているようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that it has gotten much worse under the influence of the <Blue>Will<White>.
